format: A data frame with 77 observations on the following 4 variables.
title: "How Solid is Mass Support for Democracy—And How Can We Measure It?"
description:
Description
A data set based on summary information provided in Inglehart's (2003)
article in PS: Political Science & Politics. These data would be from
the article itself and only indirectly from the raw World or European
Values Survey.
reference: Data manually entered based on Table 1 and Table 2 in Inglehart's (2003) article.

parameters.state_year: the state year and survey year, as provided in the article
parameters.muslim: a dummy variable that equals 1 if Inglehart codes the state as being a "predominently Islamic society"
parameters.strongleader: the percentage of respondents saying having a strong leader unencumbered by elections or parliaments is "very good" or "good"
parameters.havedem: the percentage of respondents saying having a democratic political system is "very good" or "good"
